name: Security Grandma
description:
Key Commands

  • WASD - BASIC MOVEMENTS
  • E - ACTIONS (GET CUP, GET COFFEE, GIVE COFFEE, HOLD BROOM) 
  • F - DROP BROOM 
  • LEFT MOUSE BUTTON - HIT ENEMY

Objective

  • Your main objective is keep the guards wake giving them coffee and defend to the diamonds from the ninja thiefs...

This game was made by johnperes for the Jams

Weekly Game Jam 159 with the theme "Coffee" and PB Game Jam 4 : Sneaky
